actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases, under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, to $3,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
